During this field hearing, we examined homelessness within the Veteran community. Lack of affordable housing options and the need for prevention were two key takeaways.  I look forward to continuing to work on these issues during a local hearing in Sept.

This change is a step in the right direction.  However, I've filed a bill to give Veterans taking courses delivered completely online the full housing benefit.  Veterans shouldn't be penalized for using technology to meet their educational needs.
